title: #98 - Hotline Edition: Let’s go to Tulum!
description:
You’ve got questions. Maria has questions! The hotline is open and ready for your questions!Want to chat with Maria on an upcoming episode? Follow her on Insta to find out when the hotline will open next… http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria Things discussed in this episode include…

  • Guys can be flaky on the apps about meeting up. How do I deal with it?
  • I matched with a guy on an app in a different city. We’ve been talking online. Should I go and meet him?
  • I’m 23. I want to date seriously. How do I go about doing that?
 

To register for the upcoming Agape Escapes event in Tulum, visit http://agapeescapes.com/

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
